The resulting 3D model will have the following dimensions: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.3867 - Height: 0.75 Step 7: Set up the operation Use the "NewBodyFeatureOperation" as the boolean operation to integrate the current part with the preceding CAD models. Now you have created a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides, with dimensions 2 units by 3 units by 4 units.</description>
